
# Photo Mosaic

- python [Photomosaic package by Daniel Ballan](http://danielballan.github.io/photomosaic/docs)

## General Procedure

1. Prepare lots of image data. One image can also be used by applying proper image processing techniques such as brightness control, color contol, or saturation control.
1. define grid size on the source image
1. For each grid, generate proper thumb nail image.
1. Save the output.
